General.Name: Tanzanian Royalty Exploration Corp
General.Description: TRX Gold Corporation, a junior gold mining company, engages in the exploration, development, and production of mineral property in Tanzania. Its flagship project includes Buckreef Gold Project in Tanzania. The company was formerly known as Tanzanian Gold Corporation and changed its name to TRX Gold Corporation in May 2022. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Oakville, Canada.
General.Address: 277 Lakeshore Road East, Oakville, ON, Canada, L6J 6J3
